name: Total Flight Solutions
about: Total Flight Solutions, located in Louisburg and Pinehurst, North Carolina, is a full-service flight school offering comprehensive training in both fixed-wing and helicopter aviation. Since its inception in January 2011, the school has provided safe, friendly, and cost-effective aviation services. We cater to both career-oriented and recreational flyers, with programs ranging from private pilot to CFII and turbine transition training. Our experienced staff and well-maintained fleet, including Remos, Cessna, and Robinson helicopters, ensure a professional and supportive learning environment. We also offer commercial services such as aerial photography, pipeline patrols, and wildlife surveys. With a full-service maintenance facility and partnerships with Utah Valley University for aviation degree programs, Total Flight Solutions is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals. Contact us today to start your journey to the skies.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
